p: Hurrah for the good news! But I warn you, it's Nanny and Gaki are going to spoil it. Dog on! Gaki wants to hold that Wub & pet it! Be careful and don't teeter the basket.

The kids were here & are goine - zip! Happy visit. Last night I couldn't get to sleep, so I came downstairs for a bite to stay my nearly empty belly. Mama was sawing wood, and I couldnt ask her where in hell she tied the cheese. So I went around calling, Hyah, Lim! Hyah, Lim! There was the sound of a porch post popping outside, a snapping rope, adn it burst through the back door, dashed over to the bread box, grabbed a
biscuit, then leaped at me with its tongue out and its tail wagging. I got to sleep in fine shape after that. that's doing well for a pup, but wait till it's a little older!
I wish I knew when we're going up there. I'm looking forward to a visit with you.
